text: Rudolph "Bingo" Kampman (March 12, 1914 - December 22, 1987) was a Canadian ice hockey defenceman in the NHL. He was born in Kitchener, Ontario. ==Awards and achievements== 1942 Stanley Cup Championship (Toronto) ==External links== * *Picture of Bingo Kampman's Name on the 1942 Stanley Cup Plaque Category:1914 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Kitchener Greenshirts players Category:Sportspeople from Kitchener, Ontario Category:Providence Reds players Category:St. Louis Flyers players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Rudolph Kampman
